property.name: formId
property.label: Form ID
property.description: The ID of the form to display

property.name: isApplicationForm
property.label: Is Application Form
property.description: Indicates if this is an application form

property.name: isCreateApplication
property.label: Is Create Application
property.description: Indicates if this form creates an application

property.name: isPrefillFieldsForm
property.label: Is Prefill Fields Form
property.description: Indicates if fields should be prefilled

property.name: primaryObjectForPrefill
property.label: Primary Object For Prefill
property.description: Object API name for prefilling fields

property.name: isDependentForm
property.label: Is Dependent Form
property.description: Indicates if this is a dependent form

property.name: trackerRecordId
property.label: Tracker Record ID
property.description: ID of the tracker record for dependent forms
